org.apache.polygene.api.identity

Interface HasIdentity

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AbstractConfigurationDeserializationTest.ConfigSerializationConfig, AbstractEntityStoreTest.TestEntity, AbstractValueCompositeSerializationTest.BarEntity, AbstractValueCompositeSerializationTest.Some, AlarmEvent, AlarmPoint, AlarmPointEntity, AlarmProxy, AlarmProxy.Factory, Cat, City, ConfigurationComposite, DataSourceConfiguration, DBCPDataSourceServiceImporter, Dog, Domain, EntityComposite, EntityList, EntryPoint, EnvironmentLoaderService, Female, Male, MemoryEntityStoreService, Nameable, NativeConfiguration, OSGiEnabledService, Owner, PersistingSequencingService, Person, Pet, Role, RoleAssignee, SequenceEntity, ServiceComposite, Staff, TransientSequencingService, UuidServiceComposite
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AlarmEvent.Mixin, AlarmPoint.AlarmPointMixin, AlarmProxy.FactoryMixin, AlarmProxy.Mixin, HasIdentity.HasIdentityMixin, OSGiEnabledService.OSGiEnabledServiceMixin, Role.Mixin, RoleAssignee.Mixin

    @Mixins(value=HasIdentity.HasIdentityMixin.class)
public interface HasIdentity
    This interface provides the identity of the object which may be used to store the state in a database. It is not the responsibility of the framework to come up with a good identity string.
